LanguageData.Apparello_basicbrim.label: 巫毒面具
LanguageData.Apparello_basicbrim.description: A hat shrouded with mystery. Sometimes it contains bunnies, paychecks, oranges or various other loot。
LanguageData.Apparello_Bandit.label: 强盗面罩
LanguageData.Apparello_Bandit.description: Stylish, elegant and soft to the touch. Known as the most important part of western attire, sspecially amongst the card cheats and other slippery individuals. It comes with a scarf for added banditry。
